column5: Hi all,    Our lake completely froze over in one night! Most of the small ponds have been iced over for a week now.
My pool froze over last night Simon... I get in trouble if I drill there !
My pool froze over last night Simon... I get in trouble if I drill there !   I heard your pool was fished out anyway.
Good for spotted salamanders, bull frogs and turtles. Fish.. not so much!!
I saw a couple of snowflakes yesterday, funny how living 25 miles south of Lake Erie can make such a difference in the amount of snowfall? Cleveland and points east of it got a lot.

I saw a couple of snowflakes yesterday, funny how living 25 miles south of Lake Erie can make such a difference in the amount of snowfall? Cleveland and points east of it got a lot.  Its the same here. I drove to Thunder Bay yesterday. Not much snow here in dryden or in TBay, but halfway at Uppsalaâ€¦.lots!

Looks beautiful Simon, you and your son will be rippin across the lake before u know it.  The jig head u supplied last year has been putting the whities on the ice up here for the last couple of weeks.  the bigger lakes still have to firm up more yet
woohoo!  won't be long here either...even some goofs out riding snowmachines already
